author: Peter Nicholas
title: Republicans Defend Trump Aide Who Admitted Telling ‘White Lies’ on President’s Behalf
text:
WASHINGTON—Republicans on Wednesday defended a senior White House aide who acknowledged she had told what she described as innocuous lies on President Donald Trump’s behalf, saying Democrats had questioned her truthfulness to embarrass her.
Hope Hicks, the White House communications director, spent nearly nine hours before the House Intelligence Committee on Tuesday, fielding questions about the campaign and the presidential transition while refusing to talk about the 13 months she has spent in the West Wing.
...
